nodes.bodyText: I can't see the performance improvement as part of this PR
nodes.diffHunk:

-## 2020-03-05, Version 0.9.0.6 (Current)
+## 2020-03-31, Version 0.9.0.7 (Current)
+
+- Fixed bug which caused user to lose roles on account password update
+- Performance improvement by implementing faster version of implies type perm
